uniCloud_props.name: # uniCloud
uniCloud_props.param:
## Parameters 

| name | type | required | default | description |
| :- | :- | :- | :- | :- |
| config | [UniCloudInitOptions](#unicloudinitoptions-values) | YES | - | - |
### UniCloudInitOptions Values @unicloudinitoptions-values 

| name | type | optinal | default | description |
| :- | :- | :- | :- | :- |
| provider | string | YES | - | 服务商，目前支持 aliyun、tencent |
| spaceName | string | NO | - | 服务空间名 |
| spaceId | string | YES | - | 服务空间id |
| clientSecret | string | NO | - | 阿里云clientSecret |
| endpoint | string | NO | - | 阿里云endpoint |

| :- | :- | :- | :- | :- |

| :- | :- | :- | :- | :- |

#### UniCloudImportObjectOptions Values @unicloudimportobjectoptions-values 

| name | type | optinal | default | description |
| :- | :- | :- | :- | :- |
| customUI | boolean | NO | - | 是否移除自动展示的ui |
| loadingOptions | [UniCloudImportObjectLoadingOptions](#unicloudimportobjectloadingoptions-values) | NO | - | loading界面配置 |

| :- | :- | :- | :- | :- |

| name | type | optinal | default | description |
| :- | :- | :- | :- | :- |
| type | string | NO | - | 错误提示类型，可以是modal或者toast |
| retry | boolean | NO | - | 是否显示重试按钮 |
